title: Participle Clauses 2
description: Make a reduced relative clause. These sentences all need a passive clause.

parts.value: The television was stolen (the television was bought twenty years ago)

parts.answer: The television bought twenty years ago was stolen.
answerList: The television bought twenty years ago was stolen.

parts.value: I often buy cheese (the cheese is imported from Paris)

parts.answer: I often buy cheese imported from Paris.
answerList: I often buy cheese imported from Paris.

parts.value: The bread is in the kitchen (the bread was brought by John)

parts.answer: The bread brought by John is in the kitchen.
answerList: The bread brought by John is in the kitchen.

parts.value: We live in a house (the house was built by my grandfather)

parts.answer: We live in a house built by my grandfather.
answerList: We live in a house built by my grandfather.

parts.value: The money has been given to charity (the money was found in the street)

parts.answer: The money found in the street has been given to charity.
answerList: The money found in the street has been given to charity.

parts.value: We all praised the cake (the cake was baked by my mother)

parts.answer: We all praised the cake baked by my mother.
answerList: We all praised the cake baked by my mother.

parts.value: The robber ran away (the robber was seen by David)

parts.answer: The robber seen by David ran away.
answerList: The robber seen by David ran away.

parts.value: I really loved the flowers (the flowers were grown in London)

parts.answer: I really loved the flowers grown in London.
answerList: I really loved the flowers grown in London.

parts.value: The coffee is very strong (the coffee is drunk in Turkey)

parts.answer: The coffee drunk in Turkey is very strong.
answerList: The coffee drunk in Turkey is very strong.

parts.value: I don't know much about the games (the games are played by children nowadays)

parts.answer: I don't know much about the games played by children nowadays.
answerList: I don't know much about the games played by children nowadays.
